fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerSsn
fields.title: Identifying number - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtInvestInterestPaid
fields.title: Line 1. Investment interest expense paid or accrued in 2021 (see instructions)

fields.name: txtDisallowInterestExpense
fields.title: Line 2. Disallowed investment interest expense from 2020 Form 4952, line 7

fields.name: txtTotalIvestIntExp
fields.title: Line 3. Total investment interest expense. Add lines 1 and 2. - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtGrosIncHeldInv
fields.title: Line 4a. Gross income from property held for investment (excluding any net gain from the disposition of property held for investment)

fields.name: txtQualifiedDividendAmount
fields.title: Line 4b. Qualified dividends included on line 4a

fields.name: txtSubtractLn4band4a
fields.title: Line 4c. Subtract line 4b from line 4a - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtNetgainDisptInvest
fields.title: Line 4d. Net gain from the disposition of property held for investment

fields.name: txtF4952NetcapgainInp
fields.title: Line 4e. Enter the smaller of line 4d or your net capital gain from the disposition of property held for investment

fields.name: txtSubtractLn4eand4d
fields.title: Line 4f. Subtract line 4e from line 4d - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtAmtIncludedInvstInc
fields.title: Line 4g. Enter the amount from lines 4b and 4e that you elect to include in investment income

fields.name: txtTotInvestInc
fields.title: Line 4h. Investment income. Add lines 4c, 4f, and 4g - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtNetInvestInc
fields.title: Line 6. Net investment income. Subtract line 5 from line 4h. If zero or less, enter -0-. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtDisallInvIntExp
fields.title: Line 7. Disallowed investment interest expense to be carried forward to 2022. Subtract line 6 from line 3. If zero or less, enter -0-. - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTotIvestIntExpDed
fields.title: Line 8. Investment interest expense deduction. Enter the smaller of line 3 or line 6. - This field is automatically calculated for you
